title: Pff, old news. Vastaya were introduced, like, three years ago. Yawn! Try to keep up, slowpokes!

replies.body: Yeah, guys... c'mon! This is old news, I don't see what the fuss is all about

these casuls amiright? 

so basically rengar is apart of a group of Vastaya (no idea what the plural would be)
It might just be "Vastaya", like how moose is both singular and plural.
or Pokemon
*Pokemans
pokemanz***
*Pokehomies
You win.
thought plural to moose was moosen
Yeah just like boxen and geesen!

When you see a Familiar Face on a Stream :^)

https://clips.twitch.tv/CrispyCheerfulClipsmomSwiftRage

Oh wow, I remember that game! Felt really bad for the guy because he would have easily won if it wasn't 4v5 :(
He completely destroyed my top laner haha

Edit: Wait, am I actually a familiar face? O.o
Well, I remember you from the boards, my name used to be Fenris321 before I name changed :P
Ahhh that makes sense, fellow sons of Loki always remember one another :D
Vastaye
Vastayarians or Vastayan's?
Vastayans.
Mastication / Vyacheslav Molotov
Platypuses, Platypi, Platypeople?

Its platypods actually.
I mean my comment was a reference to Phineas and Ferb, but thats pretty nice to know

> [{quoted}](name=AmazoX,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=bfoEQAqR,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-04-03T21:34:03.452+0000)
>
> Vastayarians or Vastayan's?

The plural is Vastaya, singular is Vastayan.

no rengar isnt from the ionia he is from the kumnugu jungles like nidalee kha'zix and gnar. if anyone from their would be vastaya it would be nidalee with her ability to transform. (i just read the entire vastaya journal before this) and their was what looked like a human male that transformed into a pig.

It was noted that they Vastaya aren't native to Ionia only, but exist in clans all over Runeterra. Just as well, the background art on the universe page for the race has a Vastaya that pretty much looks like a slim Rengar. Think we can at least assume that all the humanoid animal champs like Rengar and Wukong may very well have parts of their lore retconned to be Vastaya.

The Kumungu jungles aren't likely canon anymore in the new lore. Zero mention of it on Rengar's lore page, and both he and Nidalee are listed as just being from Runeterra as opposed to an actual specific location.
I don't know why, but for me Rengar always looked like a fluffy sheep... Then I played vs a fed rengar. Definitelly not a sheep. (PLS RITO, NEVER AGAIN)
You only need to count to one before that sheep puts you to sleep....permanently.

You know, it never bothered me that there was an otterman shopkeeper for no reason. 

Until now.
Wait until you see the Otterman Empire.
I have never wanted to upvote something so much, and I have no idea why. This was such a meh joke.

Initially I read Ralanr's response as "ottoman shopkeeper".

I wasn't disappointed with the reply.
I mean, it's not like a TCL team will ever make it to worlds.

How could you forget the adorable old lady Vastaya shopkeeper?

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/32/Blue_Team_Shopkeeper.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/556?cb=20140705051310
I think she's a yordle though

Oh.


Oops, lmao sorry.
Yordles can still be adorable and old though :P
What if Swain used dark magics to trap a Vastaya into its crow form, while he himself reaps the power of the Vastaya? O.O
I don't get it. Is the Shopkeeper's name that?
In the http://na.leagueoflegends.com/ , there is a announcement.
Okay, and how is this related to the Shopkeeper in any way?

They introduce a new race,or a group of races,the Vastaya.
This new race basically consists of animal-human-hybrids.

The opener points out that the red shopkeeper is very likely a vastaya
What about Nasus and Renekton?
Nasus and Renekton are ascended beings. Completely different from vastaya
They are a dog and a crocodile

ok this post will probably be deleted but come on this is a total rip off. Hearthstone just announced journey to un goro last month. Cool learning more about the different worlds in league but it's like grading a college take home test.

You know that champs like this take several months to create?
Their production likely started somewhere in the fall of last year(if not even earlier).

Besides "introducing an animal/human-species" and "making an expansion pack about prehistoric creatures" isn't even remotely similar...

probably a story line to introduce the champions that are currently floting around without a home like nidalee, alistar, soraka, volibear.
surprise now they are just magical humanoid beast
